com.strategyobject.substrateclient.transport.ws

Interface ReconnectionPolicy<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - a type of policy's context required for computing the next delay or other policy's purposes Represents a strategy of reconnection
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ExponentialBackoffReconnectionPolicy

    public interface ReconnectionPolicy<T>

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static ReconnectionPolicy<?> MANUAL
      The policy that's supposed to not reconnect automatically

      • getNextDelay

        @NonNull
@NonNull Delay getNextDelay(@NonNull
                                     @NonNull ReconnectionContext<T> context)
        The method is called when connection was closed and probably should be reconnected.
        Parameters:
        context - contains a reason of disconnection and policy's context.
        Returns:
        a unit of time from now to delay reconnection.
